marker.comments: Vast services are provided. Gbv cases are higher than any other and we make sure that the law takes it's course. But mostly because man are bread winners women fail to report gbv cases.

marker.name: Girls empowerment network
marker.comments: Support young people to have access to peer support clubs and networks. Capacity bulding for teachers to deliver comprehensive sexual education. Peer educators and counsellors or facilitators have capacity to deliver sexual reproductive health and rights information. Girl education, tracking school dtopout rate, social protection schemes. Financial literate skills, income generating activities.

marker.name: Save the children
marker.comments: Save the children is about offering comprehensive education and family planning services to young people aged 10 to 24 years in hard to reach areas.

marker.name: Social walfare
marker.comments: They also cater gbv and juveniles. And also one stop centre.

marker.name: Family Planning Health Association of Malawi (FPAM)
marker.comments: General medical conditions service provision at a certain cost as opposed to SRH R services and cervical cancer screening.Post abortion support care is also provided by FPAM.Screening and treatment of STIs.General family planning services. Provision of ART services.

marker.name: Population Services International (PSI Malawi)
marker.comments: condoms htc teen

marker.name: Banja la Mtsogolo
marker.comments: Banja la Mtsogolo is also providing general medical services.Apart from Mangochi township, the institution also provide outreach clinical services in hard to reach areas across the district.

marker.name: Ministry of Labour, Sports and Manpower Development
marker.comments: child protection followups

marker.name: Ministry of Gender, Children, Disability and Social Welfare
marker.comments: The district social welfare office in Mangochi is providing drug and substance abuse support services at a minimal level due to lack of capacity by most of its social workers.They are also facing challenges in providing safe spaces to many deserving victims due to inadequate resources in terms of proper housing

marker.name: Kamwadi
marker.comments: childprotection counselling srh followup

marker.name: Amodzi Disability Organization (ADO)
marker.services: childprotection counselling condoms followups dropinservices drug teen walkin other
marker.comments: The organization is endeavoured to develop lives of less privileged in the circles of disability, orphanage and those whose rights are violated against but due to financial stamina it has found it self in most of its activities have stagnated.

marker.name: Kandezo
marker.comments: Also tackles gbv cases

marker.name: Timotheos Foundation
marker.services: counselling safespaces dropinservices drug htc teen other
marker.comments: This is a Christian founded organization ( an affiliate of Reformed Presbyterian Church ) it is due to learn that most of the services are bound to church doctrines, as such the organization doesn't offer Condoms among other SRH services as it goes against church doctrines.

marker.name: Social welfare (child protection workers )
marker.services: childprotection counselling followups dropinservices htc teen walkin other
marker.comments: Child protection workers here decry over Malawi Police shun of their responsibility, The relationship between the police and child protection workers is bad terms.

marker.name: M'dabwi Faith Based Organization
marker.services: childprotection counselling srh condoms safespaces followups dropinservices drug htc cancer teen walkin other
marker.comments: This organization has a feeding program that caters to over 100 school going children from poor households, nevertheless the support that it gets from its donors to keep the program live is not enough to sustain its operations. It however is interesting to learn that the organization has rented field where it cultivates food crops just to battle out some of the shortfalls it encounters.

marker.name: Social welfare (Chil protection worker - VGH poya, Kachingwe, Mangani and M'manga)
marker.services: childprotection counselling safespaces followups dropinservices teen walkin other
marker.comments: The child protection worker questions courts legitimacy as she bemoans increasing cases of difilement from her catchment area that have not yet face justice for a long period of time.This according to her has drawn back most parents from reporting difilement cases as reporti on the same yield them nothing.

marker.name: Child protection committee ( GV; poya )
marker.services: childprotection counselling condoms followups dropinservices drug htc teen other
marker.comments: This child protection committee here has never had any training on child protection except the chair lady who once had a one day training. This requires no much effort to strees a point that this committee surely needs a training on children protection and relevant trainings that can empower them.

marker.name: PIM police unit
marker.services: childprotection counselling safespaces dropinservices drug other
marker.comments: Mobility challenges have paralyzed most of the activities at this police unit, no follow-ups to different cases are made and this result into culprits of GBV cases go scort free.

marker.name: ST. Joseph's Hospital ( Nguludi)
marker.services: counselling srh safespaces drug htc cancer diabetes other
marker.comments: The health facility being a leaf of a Roman Catholic Church which prohibits the use of Condoms, it is due to learn that people in the near by areas are being deprived access to free condoms which is posing a threat to the fight against HIV

marker.name: Nguludi Police Unit
marker.comments: Despite the fact that the police unit serves many people in the area of its jurisdictions is however sad that the unit has little resources, ie safe space for victims to make it complete.

marker.name: Mpeya
marker.services: childprotection counselling condoms followups dropinservices htc teen walkin

marker.name: Namitanbo police unit
marker.services: childprotection counselling followups dropinservices drug other
marker.comments: The housing itself is a pathetic wonders are to how will the law enforcers operate in that near to delapidated office in the coming rainy season, if it falls definitely efforts to combat GBV in the area will be compromised.

marker.name: Thuchila police unit
marker.comments: The magistrate court in proximity of the police according to information gathered its a hand to the law enforcement facility in the sense that most GBV related cases in the area are swiftly handled and punishments to offenders are always due, as such it deters what would be offenders.

marker.name: Miqlat
marker.services: childprotection counselling followups dropinservices drug htc teen other
marker.comments: This is by observation one of the orphanages that are doing fine in the areas of provision of Drop in services to children in Chiradzulu district.

marker.name: Mulanje District Labour Office
marker.comments: They deal with issues of Child labour , Employment exchange, Workers compensation, Labour despute and labour complaints. The officer said that in his areas domestic child labour is still a challenge due to proverty and HIV/AIDS epidemic in the tea estates.

marker.name: District Nutrition and HIV/Aids Office
marker.comments: They do counselling to officers, youth on issues of HIV/Aids,Nutrition and psychological help and this reduces case of HIV/AIDS and encourage people to seek more information from his office.

marker.name: FOMO
marker.services: childprotection counselling condoms dropinservices htc teen helpline
marker.comments: They take care children on human needs e.g. clothes and food,Education support, Health services to child and parents, train vocation skills and driving school,

marker.name: Mulanje police station
marker.services: They also handle the following issues: Family misunderstandings, child neglect, Legal divorces, Extra marital affairs, Defilement
